title: Model-turned-nun Sofia Hayat gets Swastika tattooed on her feet, says we are one | bollywood | Hindustan Times
text:
Desimartini Model-turned-nun Sofia Hayat gets Swastika tattooed on her feet, says we are one 
Former model and Bigg Boss contestant Sofia Hayat sure knows how to stay in news. Last year, she announced her transformation into Mother Sofia. Now, she’s gone ahead and got the soles of her feet inked with swastika tattoos. bollywood Updated: Feb 21, 2017 15:37 IST Hindustan Times, New Delhi Sofia Hayat is a former Bigg Boss contestant who later became a nun. 
Model-turned-nun Sofia Hayat is at it again. This time, however, she seems to have lander herself in a bigger soup than the time when she announced her transformation to Mother Sofia, criticised the use of make-up, renounced sex and declared she was never going to get married. Read more Akshay Kumar, Bhumi Pednekar wrap up shooting of Toilet- Ek Prem Katha 
Sofia has now got the soles of her feet inked with swastika tattoos. She posted a photo on Instagram and wrote, “Ok..so my last photo was me having tatoos on my feet...the sacred swastika..found on the feet of BUDDHA.. the sacred .. eternal..self existence..the star of David..the Islamic moon..universal manifestation..the Sun..hindu swastika..ancient christian cross..buddhist..tibetan..it encompasses the all..the power of the universe at my feet so to at yours..wake up..we are one!” A post shared by Sofia Hayat. (Gaia Mother) (@sofiahayat) on Feb 18, 2017 at 3:47am PST 
In an interview with ABP, she said, “If you check my Instagram (sic), many young Indians are offended because I have swastika on my feet. Buddha had it on his feet. It is a symbol in all religions. I am the equal of Buddha, all things came from me. I am the Goddess Sofia. There are books written about my return. I am here for humanity. The swastika is so sacred to me… it is under my blessed feet… my whole body is sacred… like my heart my breath… my feet carry me all on this earth and under my feet lies the universe.” A post shared by Sofia Hayat. (Gaia Mother) (@sofiahayat) on Feb 18, 2017 at 5:11am PST 
The former Bigg Boss contestant surely knows how to grab the spotlight. tags
